title: Process Type Foundry
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231212/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231212/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Process Type Foundry**

Located in [Minnesota](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231212/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Minnesota), the Process Type Foundry is an independent type design studio specializing in the design of original typefaces for retail and custom use.

Process Type Foundry is the studio of [Eric Olson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231212/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eric%20Olson), [Nicole Dotin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231212/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nicole%20Dotin) and the silent, but useful Charlie.

[http://www.processtypefoundry.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231212/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/ "http://www.processtypefoundry.com")
author: Nicole Dotin
